name: Among Us: Escape
description:
Your only goal is to flee !

Why ?

Because you must survive !

Let's try this game and lose your mental in this.

Features :
  • Choose your guinea pig.
  • Dodge the killer balls.
  • Play with only 6 buttons.
  • 3 levels.
  • Take a coffe.
  • Look the end.
Credits :

Game by

Fabian D'Hondt

Music Track by

Alpharisc - Will My Hands Grow Back / youtube

Ps : I like money,  of course, but unfortunately I'm not the creator of "Among Us".  But it was fun to made this game !
